dmca.title: important legal issue
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: UniVoice [mailto:sales@univoice.us] 
Sent: Tuesday, August 02, 2005 2:25 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: important legal issue
Importance: High


To who it may concern,
 
It came to our attention that one of your hosted members is running and
reselling
a pirated illegal copy of our software - UniVoice Pro - protected by the
United States
copyrights law, on their site. 
 
The site is:
 <http://www.gumusmedya.com/silver.asp?action=SesliChat> 
lebvc.com  70.85.76.153
http://lebvc.com
 
 
Please take immediate actions against these hosts as we are preparing
legal actions against them to avoid being involved in any suit.
 
Tom J. Jones
M. 310.753.9193
P. 310.476.1528
F. 253.848.6003
tom@univoice.us
UniVoice.us
